mapper.select: select t.*, sum(tr.has_read) readCount, sum(tr.has_finish) finishedCount, count(tr.id) receiversCount from thing t left join thing_receiver tr on t.id = tr.thing_id where t.creator_id = #{userId} and t.delete_flg = 0 and tr.delete_flg = 0 group by t.id, t.create_time order by t.create_time desc

select sum(tr.has_read) readCount, sum(tr.has_finish) finishedCount, count(tr.id) receiversCount from thing t left join thing_receiver tr on t.id = tr.thing_id where t.id = #{thingId} and t.delete_flg = 0 and tr.delete_flg = 0
select t.*, u.real_name from thing t left join user u on t.creator_id = u.id where t.id = #{thingId} and t.delete_flg = 0 and u.delete_flg = 0
